text: 3. Now suppose that I has a clause with four literals, say (z1V T2 V z3 V 24). What 3-SAT clauses will you put in I’ to replace this clause, so that I’ is satisfiable if and only if I is? Hints: Break the clause up somehow. Don’t try using de Morgan’s laws. Instead, create a brand new variable, say =1, and integrate that into your new clauses.
